guide.introduction: It can be frustrating to have to take off your gloves to use your touch-screen phone. Capacitive touch screens sense how conductive your fingers are, and gloves are, well, insulators.
guide.introduction_rendered:
It can be frustrating to have to take off your gloves to use your touch-screen phone. Capacitive touch screens sense how conductive your fingers are, and gloves are, well, insulators.

Relevant parts
  • Gloves
  • Conductive yarn
Tools
  • Scissors
  • Sewing needle

lines.text: For this project, you'll need a needle and some conductive thread.
lines.text_raw: For this project, you'll need a needle and some conductive thread.

lines.text: To make a pathway for the electricity to travel, sew a small spot of conductive thread to the fingertip of the glove.
lines.text_raw: To make a pathway for the electricity to travel, sew a small spot of conductive thread to the fingertip of the glove.

lines.text: Be sure to leave a long tail of thread inside the finger of the glove to make good contact with your skin.
lines.text_raw: Be sure to leave a long tail of thread inside the finger of the glove to make good contact with your skin.

lines.text: Make many stitches with the thread to build up a conductive surface.
lines.text_raw: Make many stitches with the thread to build up a conductive surface.

lines.text: To cut the thread, first leave a long tail inside the finger of the glove. Then repeat the process on the glove's thumb.
lines.text_raw: To cut the thread, first leave a long tail inside the finger of the glove. Then repeat the process on the glove's thumb.

lines.text: The hardest part about this project is doing everything left-handed.
lines.text_raw: The hardest part about this project is doing everything left-handed.

lines.text: When I paid attention to the way I use my phone, I found that the best place for the thumb pad was actually along the side of my thumb.
lines.text_raw: When I paid attention to the way I use my phone, I found that the best place for the thumb pad was actually along the side of my thumb.

lines.text: Try your gloves out on your touch-screen devices and enjoy!
lines.text_raw: Try your gloves out on your touch-screen devices and enjoy!

lines.text: If your gloves don't work right away, try adding more conductive thread fringe on the insides of your gloves' fingers.
lines.text_raw: If your gloves don't work right away, try adding more conductive thread fringe on the insides of your gloves' fingers.
